name: ðŸ”–Status
info:
Accepts none, some, or all of the three values of:
1. fill
2. shape
3. text
Needed for setting the status visual clue on the container node.
You may apply some or all the nodes.

If none supplied, it sets the node status as found
in msg.state.status current values. 

if some applied, the missing ones are consumed from
the current values from msg.state.status
